sentence: i would like a flight from las vegas to san diego . on a weekday . with meals
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v0.flight_id||'"', '"'||v1.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v2.city_code||'"', '"'||v2.city_name||'"', '"'||v3.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v4.city_code||'"', '"'||v4.city_name||'"',
 '"'||v5.meal_code||'"', '"'||v6.days_code||'"', '"'||v6.day_name||'"',
 v5.meal_number, '"'||v5.compartment||'"' FROM flight v0,
 airport_service v1, city v2, airport_service v3,
 city v4, food_service v5, days v6 
WHERE (((v0.from_airport = ANY v1.airport_code) 
AND ((v1.city_code = ANY v2.city_code) 
AND (v2.city_name = 'LAS VEGAS'))) AND (((v0.to_airport = ANY v3.airport_code) 
AND ((v3.city_code = ANY v4.city_code) 
AND (v4.city_name = 'SAN DIEGO'))) AND (((v0.meal_code = ANY v5.meal_code) 
AND ( 1 =  1)) AND (((v0.flight_days = ANY v6.days_code) 
AND (v6.day_name = 'MONDAY')) OR (((v0.flight_days = ANY v6.days_code) 
AND (v6.day_name = 'TUESDAY')) OR (((v0.flight_days = ANY v6.days_code) 
AND (v6.day_name = 'WEDNESDAY')) OR (((v0.flight_days = ANY v6.days_code) 
AND (v6.day_name = 'THURSDAY')) OR ((v0.flight_days = ANY v6.days_code) 
AND (v6.day_name = 'FRIDAY')))))))));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT FLIGHT.FLIGHT_ID FROM FLIGHT WHERE ( FLIGHT . FROM_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' LAS VEGAS ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . TO_AIRPORT IN ( SELECT AIRPORT_SERVICE . AIRPORT_CODE FROM AIRPORT_SERVICE WHERE AIRPORT_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' SAN DIEGO ' ) ) AND ( FLIGHT . MEAL_CODE IN ( SELECT FOOD_SERVICE . MEAL_CODE FROM FOOD_SERVICE WHERE 1 = 1 ) AND ( FLIGHT . FLIGHT_DAYS IN ( SELECT DAYS . DAYS_CODE FROM DAYS WHERE DAYS.DAY_NAME = ' MONDAY ' ) OR ( FLIGHT . FLIGHT_DAYS IN ( SELECT DAYS . DAYS_CODE FROM DAYS WHERE DAYS.DAY_NAME = ' TUESDAY ' ) OR ( FLIGHT . FLIGHT_DAYS IN ( SELECT DAYS . DAYS_CODE FROM DAYS WHERE DAYS.DAY_NAME = ' WEDNESDAY ' ) OR ( FLIGHT . FLIGHT_DAYS IN ( SELECT DAYS . DAYS_CODE FROM DAYS WHERE DAYS.DAY_NAME = ' THURSDAY ' ) OR FLIGHT . FLIGHT_DAYS IN ( SELECT DAYS . DAYS_CODE FROM DAYS WHERE DAYS.DAY_NAME = ' FRIDAY ' ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ;
